name: Moseiki: the UK based WEB3 social media
overview: Implemented the Flutter frontend and conducted WEB3 integration with the backend for this social media app.
details: Implemented the Flutter frontend of the WEB3 social media app.
WEB3 integration was conducted with backend.

name: JConnect: Tinder-like Business Social Media
overview: A platform to help professionals match and make business connections based on interests, roles, and location. Implemented instant messaging using Flutter and Laravel.
details: This project aims to help professionals to match and make business. They can be matched based on their interests, roles and location.
Instant messaging is implemented on Flutter with using streaming and websocket on Laravel backend.
